mapper.select: SELECT PRJT_NO , COUNT(PRJT_NO) AS COUNT FROM PROJECT_MEMBER GROUP BY PRJT_NO

SELECT pm.memb_id , prjt_no , prjt_memb_perm , prjt_fav , memb_pwd , memb_nm , memb_birth_dt , memb_email , memb_telno , co_cd , memb_dept , memb_msg FROM project_member pm LEFT JOIN member m ON(pm.memb_id = m.memb_id)
AND prjt_no = #{prjtNo}

SELECT pm.memb_id , NVL(mg.buss_st_cnt,0) AS end_cnt , NVL(mg.total,0) AS total , ROUND(NVL(buss_st_cnt/total*100,0)) AS status , m.memb_nm FROM project_member pm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT memb_id , buss_st , COUNT(memb_id) AS buss_st_cnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM business_member WHERE memb_id = bm.memb_id) total FROM business_member bm LEFT JOIN business b ON(bm.buss_no = b.buss_no) WHERE bm.prjt_no = #{prjtNo} GROUP BY memb_id, buss_st ) mg ON(pm.memb_id = mg.memb_id) LEFT JOIN member m ON(pm.memb_id = m.memb_id)
AND prjt_no = #{prjtNo}
AND mg.buss_st = 'END' OR mg.buss_st IS NULL
ORDER BY pm.memb_id
